WorkflowInfo.Name: Deploying Virtual Machines from a Template
WorkflowInfo.Description: Deploying virtual machines from a template
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ReadXLS;Assembly=ReadXLS, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:VMClone;Assembly=VMClone, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:MemorySet;Assembly=MemorySet, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="localhost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\Deploy.xls" Password="" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /><ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns3:ExitWhile DisplayName="Exit While" x:Name="exitWhile1" Description="Exit current while activity" IsValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" /><ns4:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="CloneName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns4:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="TemplateName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns5:VMClone IsValid="True" CloneVMName="%CloneName%" HostName="vCenter" TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="vmClone1" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="VM Clone" Password="" Description="Clone the specified virtual machine" HostId="86" TypeName="VMClone" UserName="" VMName="%TemplateName%" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"><ns6:ReturnValue Value="Success" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Success)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns7:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" VariableValue="%CloneName% has been created successfully from %TemplateName%" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="True" VariableName="DeployReport" x:Name="memorySet1" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"><ns6:ReturnValue Value="Default Branch" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="{x:Null}" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="0" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity><ns2:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Deployment Report" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="0" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail1" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=unicode" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 8.00.7601.17874"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">%DeployReport%</BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
